Human Input/Output Device
System
Collaboration diagram for Human Input/Output Device:

Detailed Description

This device interface is for human interaction. It is used for devices such as buttons and LEDs.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define I_HIO_GETATTR

This request gets the attributes of the device.

Example:

hio_attr_t attr;
ioctl(fildes, I_HIO_GETATTR, &attr);
#define I_HIO_INIT

This initializes the driver. It is usually executed by the system and doesn't need initialization by any applications.

#define I_HIO_REPORT

This request gets the status of the report. This can be used to read the value of the inputs (such as a HIO_IN_BUTTON).

The data format is according to the descriptor.

See Also
hio_desc_t
#define I_HIO_SETREPORT

This request writes to outputs. For example, it can be used to turn an LED on and off if the descriptor contains a HIO_OUT_LED type.

See Also
hio_desc_t

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum hio_data_t
Enumerator
HIO_TYPE_BIT 

Unsigned 8-bit value.

HIO_TYPE_UINT8 

Unsigned 8-bit value.

HIO_TYPE_UINT16 

Unsigned 16-bit value.

HIO_TYPE_UINT32 

Unsigned 32-bit value.

HIO_TYPE_UINT64 

Unsigned 64-bit value.

HIO_TYPE_INT8 

Signed 8-bit value.

HIO_TYPE_INT16 

Signed 16-bit value.

HIO_TYPE_INT32 

Signed 32-bit value.

HIO_TYPE_INT64 

Signed 64-bit value.

HIO_TYPE_FLOAT 

Floating point value.

HIO_TYPE_DOUBLE 

Double Floating point value.

enum hio_io_type
Enumerator
HIO_EXTREMA 

Specifies the min/max of the previous type.

HIO_IN_BUTTON 

Momentary push button.

HIO_IN_DPAD 

Directional pad (up, down, left, right, center)

HIO_IN_JOYSTICK 

Analog joystick.

HIO_IN_SWITCH 

Switch (stays in one position)

HIO_IN_SELECTOR 

Selects one of several positions.

HIO_OUT_LED 

LED.

HIO_IN_STATUS 

Catch all status input.

HIO_OUT_STATUS 

Catch all status output.

enum hio_subtype
Enumerator
HIO_DPAD_UP 

D-pad up bit.

HIO_DPAD_RIGHT 

D-pad right bit.

HIO_DPAD_DOWN 

D-pad down bit.

HIO_DPAD_LEFT 

D-pad left bit.

HIO_DPAD_CENTER 

D-pad center bit.

HIO_JOYSTICK_X 

Joystick X index.

HIO_JOYSTICK_Y 

Joystick Y index.

HIO_EXTREMA_MIN 

Extrema min index.

HIO_EXTREMA_MAX 

Extrema max index.
